thread.title: Sushmita Sen's New York Style Is Just Like How They Show It In The Movies
thread.title_full: Sushmita Sen's New York Style Is Just Like How They Show It In The Movies

title: Sushmita Sen's New York Style Is Just Like How They Show It In The Movies
text:
facebook 
Sushmita Sen has beautifully opened up to the world of Instagram, and our celeb-hungry hearts   We love stalking her, and keeping a tab on her many escapades with daughters, Renee and Alisah. Now, thanks to a new post, we know that Sush is in New York. And while she is there, the former Miss Universe is dressing for it. Like a true New Yorker, she was seen in a perfectly-fitting red coat, styled with a printed rich-girl scarf and thigh-high boots. A cross-body sling finished out our homegirl's city look. 
While in the city, Sush also stopped by her go-to hairdresser. And, boy did she look flawless in her no make-up look. 
A post shared by Sushmita Sen (@sushmitasen47) on Mar 29, 2017 at 12:05pm PDT 
We are hoping that there would be more such stunners from her Big Apple trip. Well, we're here for all of it, Sush. Picture Credits : Instagram/afashionitsadiaries
